content.raw:
In [branch drc_practice_valves_scpeters](#!/osrf/gazebo_models/compare/drc_practice_valves_scpeters..drc_practice_valves#diff) I updated some inertia values and joint damping for the ball valve models. I also removed the model name from a scoped link name to allow for multiple instances of the ball valve wall model.

I got sidetracked by the sdformat pull request. I'll review the rest of the valves tomorrow.
content.html:
In branch drc_practice_valves_scpeters I updated some inertia values and joint damping for the ball valve models. I also removed the model name from a scoped link name to allow for multiple instances of the ball valve wall model.

I got sidetracked by the sdformat pull request. I'll review the rest of the valves tomorrow.
